titles.title: Procurement Opportunities for Vietnam POWs Act
To increase opportunities for veterans held as prisoners-of-war during the Vietnam era to participate in Department of Defense procurement actions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Procurement Opportunities for Vietnam POWs Act - Deems a person who was held as a prisoner of war during the Vietnam era a socially and economically disadvantaged individual, thus permitting such individual to be included in a target group of minorities for which the Department of Defense seeks to obligate five percent of all procurement contracts during FY 1996 and 1997.
